overview: Harley Jameseon and Jill Kassidy are having a girlfriend date where they paint their nails and take plenty of selfies. • When Sierra Nicole finds Elena Koshka sleeping in just a bra and thong, she couldn't ask for a hotter sight. • Apolonia Lapiedra and Foxii Black meet for their date and admire one another's dresses. • When Angel Smalls and Lucie Cline wake up together, the morning is instantly off to a good start.
title: Candy Kisses
